```{r, load-&-libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(httr)

tweets_data <- read.csv(url("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mweath/replication_project_598/blob/master/Data/electionday_tweets_clean.csv"))

tweets <- tweets_data[,]

tweets$FakeNewsLabel <- ifelse(tweets$is_fake_news == TRUE, 'fake news', 'other')
```
